content.prompt: Given the evolution of campaign communication described in the passage, which of the following is a way that political candidates most likely would use these tools to reach the broadest possible base of supporters?

choices.label: Creating a direct e-mail campaign targeting college students to increase campaign donations
Using social media tools to target different demographic and political groups with messages designed to appeal to them
Holding large political rallies to appeal to base constituents and establish an ideologically unified party
Publishing op-ed columns about prominent campaign issues in national newspapers

topic.text: 5.4: How and Why Political Parties Change and Adapt
